comments.body: Would be possible to name (or include) the coreos os release number (1010-5-0)?
Can we open an issue for that and fix it in a separate PR?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@# `gcloud compute --project <to-project> disks create <image name> --image=https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/<from-project>/global/images/<image-name>`
# `gcloud compute --project <to-project> images create <image-name> --source-disk=<image-name>`
GCE_IMAGES=e2e-node-ubuntu-trusty-docker10-image,e2e-node-ubuntu-trusty-docker9-image,e2e-node-ubuntu-trusty-docker8-image,e2e-node-coreos-stable20160622-image,e2e-node-containervm-v20160321-image
GCE_ZONE=us-central1-f
GCE_PROJECT=kubernetes-jenkins
